tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ppc_ad_performance (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    device_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_data (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ppc_ad_performance (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_type VARCHAR(255),
  clicks INT,
  impressions INT
)

CREATE TABLE ppc_ad_devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_category VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ppc_ad_segments (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  segment_name VARCHAR(255),
  segment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE device_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_type VARCHAR(255),
    ad_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_data (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_id INT,
    ad_type VARCHAR(100),
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ads_ad_performance (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);
